cause.description:
Danny Denton is fresh into college. However, there is one problem, He hasn't gotten laid once in his life. This, unfortunate fate, has caused great grief within his family, hoping his 16 year old cousin will pick up the slack for him.
Please help this lost soul
1. Danny Denton is a nice person
2. Everybody needs a home
3. Because there is no pussy on the moon
cause.mission: Get Danny Denton laid by July 22, 2008
cause.name: The Get Danny Denton laid foundation
